decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be carried on only by Ms Henry and shall be for a limited period being the period of three years from the date of this permission (29/01/2019), or the period during which the use is operated by Ms Henry whichever is the shorter.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and to permit reconsideration in the light of circumstances then prevailing.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Site Location Plan; Block Plan; A-(10)-010; A-(10)-011; Supporting Document received in an email on 29th Jan 2019 and Design and Access Statement

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The proposal shall not have more than two children and two carers living at the subject site 51 Wolseley Road at any one time, without any prior written permission of the local authority.

REASON: To protect the amenities of the neighbouring occupiers and in the interest of Highway Safety.
Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used for the purpose specified in the application and for no other purpose, including any other purpose in Class C2 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any Statutory Instrument revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification).
REASON: a: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality.
	b: In the interests of highway safety.
description: Change of use of House of Multiple Occupancy (HMO) (Use Class C4) to residential care home (Use Class C2) for two children/persons.
